title: Creations & Chromed
description: This week Gary and Chris from Creations n' Chrome join us. These guys know their Mustangs producing 200+ mph cars, mid-engine Mustangs and all manner of other custom creations.  Beyond Chris' obvious mechanical and engineering talents Gary brings some serious knowledge to the table in the world of body work and paint.  The n' Chrome part of the business refers to their highly sought after chrome paint applications. Gary and Chris walk us through building SEMA cars, their standing mile experience and most importantly their tips on how to avoid A. being shot by the police and B. contesting tickets.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
